Brother and Sister Kress, I have written this because I am intensely interested in the subject of temperance. I hope that all who have any responsibilities to bear in the Sanitarium will do all in their power against the great evil of intemperance. Invite all, old and young, to sign the pledge. The Lord 


                                     -84- 

will bless in this good work.--Letter 166, 1903. 





Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. March 2, 1989. Entire Letter.
